<span id="cb3-13"><a href="#cb3-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>

<div id="tmap-code" class="section level2">
<h2>Tmap code</h2>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb4"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb4-1"><a href="#cb4-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dataCatchment <span class="ot">&lt;-</span>  <span class="fu">dbReadTable</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-2"><a href="#cb4-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  con,  </span>
<span id="cb4-3"><a href="#cb4-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;v_abundance&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-4"><a href="#cb4-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-5"><a href="#cb4-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">inner_join</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-6"><a href="#cb4-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">tribble</span>(<span class="sc">~</span>abundance_level_id, <span class="sc">~</span>abundance_interpretation,</span>
<span id="cb4-7"><a href="#cb4-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>            <span class="dv">1</span>, <span class="st">&#39;Not recorded in the period&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb4-8"><a href="#cb4-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>            <span class="dv">2</span>, <span class="st">&#39;Occasional vagrants&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb4-9"><a href="#cb4-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>            <span class="dv">3</span>, <span class="st">&#39;Functional populations&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb4-10"><a href="#cb4-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>            <span class="dv">4</span>, <span class="st">&#39;Abundant functional populations&#39;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-11"><a href="#cb4-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>      <span class="fu">mutate</span>(<span class="at">abundance_interpretation =</span> <span class="fu">factor</span>(abundance_interpretation,</span>
<span id="cb4-12"><a href="#cb4-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                                               <span class="at">levels =</span> .<span class="sc">$</span>abundance_interpretation)), </span>
<span id="cb4-13"><a href="#cb4-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="at">by =</span> <span class="st">&quot;abundance_level_id&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb4-14"><a href="#cb4-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-15"><a href="#cb4-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>catchment_geom <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">st_read</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-16"><a href="#cb4-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  con, </span>
<span id="cb4-17"><a href="#cb4-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">query =</span>   <span class="st">&quot;SELECT * FROM diadesatlas.v_basin vb&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-18"><a href="#cb4-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb4-19"><a href="#cb4-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  rmapshaper<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">ms_simplify</span>() <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-20"><a href="#cb4-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">st_transform</span>(<span class="st">&quot;+proj=wintri&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb4-21"><a href="#cb4-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-22"><a href="#cb4-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dataALL <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">dbGetQuery</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-23"><a href="#cb4-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  con, </span>
<span id="cb4-24"><a href="#cb4-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="st">&quot;SELECT * from diadesatlas.v_species_ices_occurence vsio &quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-25"><a href="#cb4-25" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-26"><a href="#cb4-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="co">#tibble() %&gt;% </span></span>
<span id="cb4-27"><a href="#cb4-27" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">mutate</span>(<span class="at">nb_occurence =</span> <span class="fu">as.integer</span>(nb_occurence))</span>
<span id="cb4-28"><a href="#cb4-28" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-29"><a href="#cb4-29" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>ices_geom <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">st_read</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-30"><a href="#cb4-30" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  con, </span>
<span id="cb4-31"><a href="#cb4-31" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">query =</span> <span class="st">&quot;SELECT * FROM diadesatlas.v_ices_geom;&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb4-32"><a href="#cb4-32" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb4-33"><a href="#cb4-33" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="co"># st_transform(&quot;+proj=eqearth +wktext&quot;) %&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb4-34"><a href="#cb4-34" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">st_transform</span>(<span class="st">&quot;+proj=wintri&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb4-35"><a href="#cb4-35" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  rmapshaper<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">ms_simplify</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-36"><a href="#cb4-36" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-37"><a href="#cb4-37" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-38"><a href="#cb4-38" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># </span><span class="al">NOTE</span><span class="co">: the species are passed with the latin name in the foreground. </span></span>
<span id="cb4-39"><a href="#cb4-39" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># In the front of the app, the user will have to select an english/french name</span></span>
<span id="cb4-40"><a href="#cb4-40" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">tm_draw</span>(</span>
<span id="cb4-41"><a href="#cb4-41" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">species_latin_name =</span> <span class="st">&quot;Salmo trutta&quot;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb4-42"><a href="#cb4-42" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">spatial_type =</span> <span class="st">&#39;rectangle&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb4-43"><a href="#cb4-43" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">con =</span> con,</span>
<span id="cb4-44"><a href="#cb4-44" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">dataCatchment =</span> dataCatchment,</span>
<span id="cb4-45"><a href="#cb4-45" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">catchment_geom =</span> catchment_geom,</span>
<span id="cb4-46"><a href="#cb4-46" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">dataALL =</span> dataALL,</span>
<span id="cb4-47"><a href="#cb4-47" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">ices_geom =</span> ices_geom</span>
<span id="cb4-48"><a href="#cb4-48" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>)</span>
<span id="cb4-49"><a href="#cb4-49" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; Some legend labels were too wide. These labels have been resized to 0.25. Increase legend.width (argument of tm_layout) to make the legend wider and therefore the labels larger.</span></span></code></pre></div>

<div class="sourceCode" id="cb5"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb5-1"><a href="#cb5-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">tm_draw</span>(</span>
<span id="cb5-2"><a href="#cb5-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">species_latin_name =</span> <span class="st">&quot;Salmo trutta&quot;</span> ,</span>
<span id="cb5-3"><a href="#cb5-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">spatial_type =</span> <span class="st">&#39;division&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb5-4"><a href="#cb5-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">con =</span> con,</span>

<span id="cb6-2"><a href="#cb6-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">species_latin_name =</span> <span class="st">&quot;Chelon ramada&quot;</span> ,</span>
